item.title: market watch 2026
item.description:
Theodosius Dobzhansky: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.

2026-02-11: Bitcoin down to 66K

  • 02/04: Bitcoin 73K-62K.

2026-02-05: stock slide continues, Bitcoin down below $63K.

  • After quarterly report, AMD down from $251 to $237 yesterday. Its peak is $266, now its around $201 premarket and around $195.

  • Google (GOOG) down 3% to around $323 after earning report.

  • Amazon down 3% to around $225 before quarterly report. After hour with quarterly report, its stock fell 20% to $200 from its peak $255 in November 2025.

item.title: notes
item.description:
Two mini-stories:

water-bottle

In a library. Put my water bottle on the foutain stand and went into the restroom. Upon returning, my water bottle was gone. While I have left it this way many many times, the water bottle always stays there without leaving. Where is it?

I went outside and saw a man leaving. Ran to him and saw my water bottle in his hand. “Excuse me, that water bottle is mine.” “Oh, I thought somebody lost it.”
